just mount the .iso with "Daemon Tools"

HZCU-N58G-WNGD-TWND-KRLD

and if its laggy , this are the minimum requirements to play the game:

CPU:
Intel Coreâ˘2 Duo 1.6 GHz or faster

1 GB RAM; Vista/Windows 7: 1.5 GB RAM

Note: 
*Supported Video Cards: ATI Radeon X1800 XT 512MB or greater; NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT 256MB or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required.

-you can see your system specs by goin to:
